meta.title: Setup Rust project foundation and dependencies

task.role: You are a Senior Rust Engineer with expertise in systems programming and APIs. Implement Task 1 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Initialize the TeamSync API project with Rust/Axum foundation and core dependencies
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create new Rust project with `cargo init` 2. Add dependencies to Cargo.toml: axum = "0.7", tokio = { version = "1.0", features = ["full"] }, serde = { version = "1.0", features = ["derive"] }, sqlx = { version = "0.7", features = ["postgres", "runtime-tokio-rustls", "chrono", "uuid"] }, redis = "0.24", uuid = { version = "1.0", features = ["v4"] }, chrono = { version = "0.4", features = ["serde"] } 3. Setup basic main.rs with axum server skeleton 4. Configure workspace structure with separate modules for handlers, models, database

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-1): Setup Rust project foundation and dependencies

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Verify project compiles successfully with `cargo build` and basic server starts on localhost
